author: Paul Kasabian
title: NFL Working on 'Virtual Solution' for Top Prospects to Appear at 2020 Draft
description: The  NFL  is planning on holding its draft from April 23-25 despite the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, but the location will be moved from Las Vegas to a studio setting, per  Sam Farmer ...
content:
Frederick Breedon/Getty Images
The NFL is planning on holding its draft from April 23-25 despite the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, but the location will be moved from Las Vegas to a studio setting, per Sam Farmer of the Los Angeles Times, as the league looks fo… [+1623 chars]
